[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@threebird/controls](./controls.md) &gt; [KeyboardAdaptorProps](./controls.keyboardadaptorprops.md) &gt; [keyMapping](./controls.keyboardadaptorprops.keymapping.md)

## KeyboardAdaptorProps.keyMapping property

Default key mapping uses up/down/left/right as semanic labels, with WASD and arrow keys mapped appropriately:

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
keyMapping?: KeyMapping;
```

## Example

keyMapping

```javascript
{
  up: ['ArrowUp', 'w', 'W'],
  down: ['ArrowDown', 's', 'S'],
  left: ['ArrowLeft', 'a', 'A'],
  right: ['ArrowRight', 'd', 'D'],
}

```
